content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw

-- Create external table using SELECT statemanet
IF OBJECT_ID('silver.trip_data_green') IS NOT NULL 
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.vendor;
Go
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE nyc_taxi_ldw.silver.trip_data_green
WITH
(
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
    LOCATION = 'silver/trip_data_green',
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
)
AS
SELECT *
FROM bronze.trip_data_green_csv;

SELECT *
FROM silver.trip_data_green;
